title: Hecarim+Homeguard+Teleport= RIOT WTF
body: This combination makes me angry. Seeing Huni abuse this combo in this match https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ysGdl8l-S4 made me pretty dumbfounded by how stupid this is. Homeguards should not be effective past a certain range from the base. They're for getting out of the base quick- not so a Hecarim (any other fast moving champ) can just teleport in and make the distance of half the map in 1 second!!! If you think it isn't a problem- watch this game. UOL continuously come back at finatic and then get destroyed just because they didn't take into consideration that Huni has teleport and can make you out of position in 4.1 seconds (4 seconds to teleport behind them.) Absolute bullcrap Riot wtf. This is troll asf.
